definitions: (in surfing) a rope attached to a surfboard and tied to the surfer's ankle to prevent the board being washed away by the surf

examples.text: he paddled out into the long slow swells, and took off his leg rope

shortDefinitions: (in surfing) rope attached to surfboard and tied to surfer's ankle to prevent board being washed away by surf

definitions: a rope secured to a horse's leg, used to prepare the horse for a rider

examples.text: those cows renowned for kicking had a leg rope put on them

shortDefinitions: rope used to secure animal by hind leg
